amendment.description: To authorize the use of multiyear procurement authority for the Navy for procurement of the Phalanx Close In Weapon System program, Block 1B.

vote.text: Amendment SA 727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 727 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S6901; text: CR S6901) To authorize the use of multiyear procurement authority for the Navy for procurement of the Phalanx Close In Weapon System program, Block 1B.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 727 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bunning.
